Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to make nurses available to public and private primary and intermediate schools.
Items.MatterName: Make available a nurse to all public /private primary and intermediate schools on a full-time basis

Items.Title: Resolution declaring September to be "Blood and Bone Marrow Donor Month" in the City of New York.
Items.MatterName: September to be "Blood and Bone Marrow Donor Month" in NYC.
